mapper.select: select id, firstname, lastname, lastname_kana, firstname_kana, zip1, zip2, address_prefecture, address_city, address_ooaza, address_aza, address_other, tel1, tel2, tel3, mobile_tel1, mobile_tel2, mobile_tel3, email, password, setai_family, setai_count, setai_status, setai_year, setai_loan, income, savings, employment_status, company_name, company_zip1, company_zip2, company_address_prefecture, company_address_city, company_address_ooaza, company_address_aza, company_address_other, company_tel1, company_tel2, company_tel3, company_department, company_industry_type, company_work_years, update_date from m_customer where id = #{id} and delete_flg = '0'

select mc.id as card_id, mc.name as card_name, md.id as brand_id, md.name as brand_name, mcc.card_number1, mcc.card_number2, mcc.card_number3, mcc.card_number4, mcc.update_date from m_customer_card mcc inner join m_card mc on mcc.card_id = mc.id and mcc.user_id = #{userId} inner join m_brand md on md.id = mcc.brand_id where mcc.delete_flg = '0' and mc.delete_flg = '0' and md.delete_flg = '0'
mapper.update:
update m_customer set
firstname = #{firstname},
lastname = #{lastname},
lastname_kana = #{lastnameKana},
firstname_kana = #{firstnameKana},
zip1 = #{zip1},
zip2 = #{zip2},
address_prefecture = #{addressPrefecture},
address_city = #{addressCity},
address_ooaza = #{addressOoaza},
address_aza = #{addressAza},
address_other = #{addressOther},
tel1 = #{tel1},
tel2 = #{tel2},
tel3 = #{tel3},
mobile_tel1 = #{mobileTel1},
mobile_tel2 = #{mobileTel2},
mobile_tel3 = #{mobileTel3},
email = #{email},
setai_family = #{setaiFamily},
setai_count = #{setaiCount},
setai_status = #{setaiStatus},
setai_year = #{setaiYear},
setai_loan = #{setaiLoan},
income = #{income},
savings = #{savings},
employment_status = #{employmentStatus},
company_name = #{companyName},
company_zip1 = #{companyZip1},
company_zip2 = #{companyZip2},
company_address_prefecture = #{companyAddressPrefecture},
company_address_city = #{companyAddressCity},
company_address_ooaza = #{companyAddressOoaza},
company_address_aza = #{companyAddressAza},
company_address_other = #{companyAddressOther},
company_tel1 = #{companyTel1},
company_tel2 = #{companyTel2},
company_tel3 = #{companyTel3},
company_department = #{companyDepartment},
company_industry_type = #{companyIndustryType},
company_work_years = #{companyWorkYears},
update_date = #{updateDate}, update_user = #{updateUser} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into m_customer( id, firstname, lastname, lastname_kana, firstname_kana, zip1, zip2, address_prefecture, address_city, address_ooaza,
address_aza,
address_other,
tel1, tel2, tel3,
mobile_tel1,
mobile_tel2,
mobile_tel3,
email, setai_family, setai_count, setai_status, setai_year, setai_loan, income, savings, employment_status, company_name, company_zip1, company_zip2, company_address_prefecture, company_address_city, company_address_ooaza,
company_address_aza,
company_address_other,
company_tel1, company_tel2, company_tel3, company_department, company_industry_type, company_work_years, password, create_date, create_user, update_date, update_user ) values( #{id}, #{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{lastnameKana}, #{firstnameKana}, #{zip1}, #{zip2}, #{addressPrefecture}, #{addressCity}, #{addressOoaza},
#{addressAza},
#{addressOther},
#{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3},
#{mobileTel1},
#{mobileTel2},
#{mobileTel3},
#{email}, #{setaiFamily}, #{setaiCount}, #{setaiStatus}, #{setaiYear}, #{setaiLoan}, #{income}, #{savings}, #{employmentStatus}, #{companyName}, #{companyZip1}, #{companyZip2}, #{companyAddressPrefecture}, #{companyAddressCity}, #{companyAddressOoaza},
#{companyAddressAza},
#{companyAddressOther},
#{companyTel1}, #{companyTel2}, #{companyTel3}, #{companyDepartment}, #{companyIndustryType}, #{companyWorkYears}, #{password}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{updateDate}, #{updateUser} )
